isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - WINDSHIELD WASHER PUMP MOTOR

svcsubproc.title: Remove Windshield Washer Pump Motor on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 93
for Items in parentheses.
The pump motor (Item 2) is removable from the washer bottle (Item 1) without removing the washer bottle, the pump motor is serviceable and replaced as a unit.

step1.para: Disconnect wiring harness connector (Item 3) from pump motor (Item 2).
Remove windshield washer hose (Item 6) from pump motor outlet port (Item 7).

Use a suitable container to catch the windshield washer fluid, hold catch container under the pump motor (Item 2), carefully pull pump motor straight out of the washer bottle (Item 1) keep the catch container under the pump motor opening until all the windshield washer fluid stops running out.
Save pump motor (Item 2) for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
